summary: The 'Safeguarding Trust in Our Politics Act' aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict certain tax-exempt organizations, specifically 501(c)(3) organizations, from directly or indirectly funding election administration. The bill prohibits these organizations from providing funds to states or local governments for election-related purposes, with an exception for donating space as polling places. The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
